meta_analysis_stig.assessment: This strategy is not just methodically correct; it is scientifically necessary for epistemic credibility

meta_analysis_stig.recommendation: Hold fast to the plan of 'Stillness + Observation'. The system has completed technical infrastructure (Rung A-C); the next 72 hours are exclusively about proving STABILITY before opening Rung D (Autonomous Proposals).
